description:
Desktop app to help you keep track of what you need to get done


Additions
Recurring reminders got some love this update (#10, thanks again @MonolithOrchids!). You can now customize their frequency and duration.
- Frequency: how often should this reminder repeat?
  - custom amount of minutes/hours/days/weeks/months/years
  - weekdays
- Duration: until when should this reminder repeat?
  - forever (default)
  - custom amount of reminders (e.g. only repeat three times)
  - until a certain date
2025-06-18.17-56-09.online-video-cutter.com.mp4
- New outline for currently selected reminder (makes it easier to tell which reminder you're currently creating/editing)

Creating reminder│Editing reminder
─────────────────┼────────────────
image            │image
─────────────────┴────────────────
- Task list tile: hovering over reminder icon for task with multiple reminders shows the number of overdue reminders (if there are any)
  image
Bugfixes
- Task edit menu correctly updates itself when the selected task changes while editing (e.g. task is completed/snoozed through notification)
- Placeholder reminder tile now correctly disappears when leaving scheduled reminder edit menu by clicking on another reminder tile
- Completing task/marking task incomplete in task edit menu triggers the correct undo notification (says 'completed'/'marked incomplete' instead of 'updated')
